10
11#include "modules/audio_coding/codecs/pcm16b/pcm16b.h"
12
13size_t WebRtcPcm16b_Encode(const int16_t* speech,
14 size_t len,
15 uint8_t* encoded) {
16 size_t i;
17 for (i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
18 uint16_t s = speech[i];
19 encoded[2 * i] = s >> 8;
20 encoded[2 * i + 1] = s;
21 }
22 return 2 * len;
23}
24
25size_t WebRtcPcm16b_Decode(const uint8_t* encoded,
26 size_t len,
27 int16_t* speech) {
28 size_t i;
29 for (i = 0; i < len / 2; ++i)
30 speech[i] = encoded[2 * i] << 8 | encoded[2 * i + 1];
31 return len / 2;
32}
33
